choose.when:
select * from ( select no, category, title, regDate, FORMAT(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1,0) AS rn from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, DATE_FORMAT(n.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as regDate from categoryNo c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryNo and
c.no=#{categoryNo} and
(n.title like '%${keyword}%' or n.content like '%${keyword}%')
(n.title like '%${keyword}%')
(n.content like '%${keyword}%')
order by no desc )k, (select @ROWNUM:=0) b )j where (#{page }-1)*#{size }+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page }*#{size }
choose.otherwise: select * from (select no, category, title, regDate, FORMAT(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1,0) AS rn from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, DATE_FORMAT(n.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as regDate from categoryNo c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryNo order by no desc )k, (select @ROWNUM:=0) b )j where (#{page }-1)*#{size }+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page }*#{size }

choose.when: insert into notice (title, content, `regDate`, `saveFileName`, `categoryNo`) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), 0, #{categoryNo})
choose.otherwise: insert into notice (title, content, `regDate`, `saveFileName`, `categoryNo`) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), #{saveFileName}, #{categoryNo})
